items.name: Telegraf
items.description: Telegraf is a plugin-driven server agent for collecting and reporting metrics. It has integrations to source a variety of metrics, events, and logs directly from containers and systems it's running on, as well as pulling metrics from third-party APIs.

items.name: gNMIc
items.description: gNMIc is a full-featured gNMI-focused streaming telemetry collector with rich data processing capabilities and high-availability support.

items.name: jalapeno
items.description: A cloud-native infrastructure platform to enable development of network services collecting telemetry with GoBMP and Telegraf.

items.name: jagw
items.description: The Jalapeño API Gateway offers you a simple and easy to use way to access the data provided by the Jalapeño application stack.

items.name: goBMP
items.description: goBMP is an implementation of Open BMP (RFC 7854) protocol's collector in go language. Collected BGP information can be published to kafka topics, stored in the file in JSON format or printed to stdout.
